DOC.brief_summary: Cross-over study evaluate effect trough FEV1 4 week treatment CHF5188 pMDI qd adult patient persistent asthma
DOC.brief_title: Cross-over Study Evaluate Effect Trough Forced Expiratory Volume One Second ( FEV1 ) After 4 Weeks Treatment With CHF 5188 pMDI qd Adult Patients With Persistent Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised , double-blind , multinational , multicentre , active-controlled , 3-way cross-over study evaluate effect trough FEV1 4 week treatment CHF5188 pMDI qd adult patient moderate severe persistent asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe asthma partly control ICS ICS/LABA FEV1 ≥ 60 % ≤ 90 % predicted patient normal value Diagnosis COPD History current evidence significant cardiovascular disease Uncontrolled concomitant disease
